modName: Castlevania style Combat Cross the Whip Battle Cross
summary:
This mod add new weapons "Combat Cross" and new enchantment "Magic Whip" (Aka New Miraak's tentacle).
New NPC Companion and Merchant"Sonia Belmont" .
New NPC Merchant "Rinaldo Gandolfi".
descriptionHtml:
Castlevania style Combat Cross the Whip Battle Cross
Version: 1.01
Author: xzax
Date 14/12/2013
Category Weapons

Skyrim Daily Mod Shout Out #63 Combat Cross
Video By Gruntlock
[youtube]CyJQVDRxbJQ[/youtube]

Skyrim Mods: Castlevania Style Combat Cross!
Video by TehMograinz
[youtube]scTmd9cr1a0[/youtube]

Top Skyrim Weapon mods (Favorite Skyrim Weapon Mods)
Video by laiilaiiheii (Just Call Me Frosty)
[youtube]cqntIIyXylg[/youtube]

=====================================================
*** This mod requires the Dragonborn DLC to work ****
=====================================================

Sorry, I am not good to use English but i will try to explain.

============
Description
============
This mod add new weapons "Combat Cross" and new enchantment "Magic Whip"
New NPC Companion and Merchant"Sonia Belmont" .
New NPC Merchant "Rinaldo Gandolfi".


======
Detail
======
This mod add new weapon "Combat Cross" it same as sword but tiny blade.
You can create by use any forge.

Add new enchantment "Magic Whip".
It can use to enchant for any weapon except staff.
It good to enchant the cross i made to fit to it.


==================
** Walkthrough ***
==================
==============
***Get a Cross
==============
Combat Cross can create by use any forge with any type of materials.
Combat Cross it same as sword but tiny blade and no "Magic Whip" effect.

==========================
***Get "Magic Whip" effect
==========================
-By one from Sonia Belmont at Whiterun Hall of the Dead.
-By one from Rinaldo Gandolfi at Solitude Temple of the Divines.
-Use enchantment table (an arcane enchanter) to disenchant the Cross grants knowledge of the

"Magic Whip" enchantment.
-Use enchantment table (an arcane enchanter) to enchant the Cross you craft before with "Magic

Whip".


=====================
Known Issues and Bugs
=====================
Enchant bow and crossbow not have "Magic Whip" effect.
Some Double enchant make "Magic Whip" disappear.
Double enchant with all "Magic Whip" is solve the problem.
Combat Cross with no Magic Whip is a sword with transparent long blade.
This weapon make damage in front not a side.


======
Update
======
Version 1.01
============
======================
-Add new Combat Cross
======================
--List--
-Dragonbone Cross
-Blood Glass Cross
-Purple Glass Cross
-Winter Glass Cross
-Imperial Cross
-Nordic Cross
-Stalhrim Cross

-Add "Huntsman's Cross" in Helgen Keep interrogation room when you start new game.
(on round table near The Book of the Dragonborn and a bag)

-Change default whip style to classic castlevania.


Version 1.0
===========
-Add New NPC Merchant "Rinaldo Gandolfi" in Solitude Temple of the Divines.
-Reappearance Sonia Belmont.
-Increase weapon range to match with Magic Whip.

======================
-Add more Combat Cross
======================
--List--
Iron Cross
Silver Cross
Steel Cross
Dwarven Cross
Elven Cross
Orcish Cross
Glass Cross
Ebony Cross
Mystic Cross
Daedric Cross

===================================
-Add more "Magic Whip" enchantment.
===================================
--List--
Whip [Absorb Health]
Whip [Absorb Magicka]
Whip [Absorb Stamina]
Whip [Banish]
Whip [Chaos Damage]
Whip [Magicka Damage]
Whip [Stamina Damage]
Whip [Fear]
Whip [Fiery Soul Trap]
Whip [Fire Damage]
Whip [Frost Damage]
Whip [Holy]
Whip [Paralyze]
Whip [Shock Damage]
Whip [Hunter]
Whip [Soul Trap]
Whip [Turn Undead]


==================
Manual installation
===================
1. Locate .zip, .rar, or .7z file
2. unzip it with any program of your choices (winrar, 7zip, etc)
3. Move files "TentacleEnt.esp" and "TentacleEnt.bsa" into Skyrim Data folder.
5. enable "TentacleEnt.esp" in the launcher or N.M.M.

=====================
Manual Uninstallation
=====================
1. Open the launcher
2. Uncheck "TentacleEnt.esp"
3. Delete CombatCross files in
XXX:SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimdata
("TentacleEnt.esp" and "TentacleEnt.bsa")

=========
Questions
=========
1. No story?
-This mod not have a story i not have time and my English is not good.

2. In game not lookalike screen shot?
-I remove that because i not have permission to use it in this mod.
Use any Beautiful enchant mod for make your game better.

3. It not a real Whip?
-Yes it a Sword with transparent blade with effect.

4. You use texture from another mod?
-This mod is edit original skyrim meshes and use original skyrim textures. If another mod
change original skyrim textures will effect to this mod.
